secondaryOutcomes.measure: Trunk Control Test - item quiet siting for 30 seconds
secondaryOutcomes.description: Sitting, hands on lap, feet of the ground. Score from 0 to 2. Higher score means better performance.

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Berg Balance Scale - item quiet standing for 2 minutes
secondaryOutcomes.description: Ability to stand unsupported. Score from 0 to 4. Higher score means better performance.
Strength of the hip flexors, knee extensors and dorsiflexors (paretic vs non paretic limb)

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Trunk Impairment test (dynamic and coordination subscales)
secondaryOutcomes.description: Test to evaluate the dynamic and coordinative performance of the trunk
Difference in weight bearing (paretic vs non-paretic) in percentage
Change in cancellation task for visuospatial neglect

eligibilityModule.studyPopulation: Participants will be recruited from rehabiliation hospital RevArte (Edegem) and AZ Monica (Antwerp).
